item.title: DevConf.CZ 2019 Recap
item.description: DevConf.CZ 2019 wrapped up last weekend and it was a great event packed with lots of knowledgeable speakers, an engaging hallway track, and delicious food.

item.title: Reaching the fork in the road
Talk Recap: Holistic Security for OpenStack Clouds
item.description: Thanks to everyone who attended my talk at the OpenStack Summit in Barcelona!

item.title: Talking to college students about information security
item.description: I was recently asked to talk to Computer Information Systems students at the University of the Incarnate Word here in San Antonio about information security in the business world.

item.title: Impostor syndrome talk: FAQs and follow-ups
item.description: I’ve had a great time talking to people about my “Be an inspiration, not an impostor” talk that I delivered in August.

item.title: Slides from my Texas Linux Fest 2015 talk
item.description: Thanks to all of the people who attended my “Be an inspiration, not an impostor” talk at Texas Linux Fest 2015.

item.title: Fedora Flock 2015: Keynote slides
item.description: Fedora Flock 2015 is still going here in Rochester, New York, and I kicked off our second day with a keynote talk about overcoming impostor syndrome.
